name: Footwork and Speed
description: Enhance mobility and speed to control distance and positioning in combat.

cards.title: Pendulum Step
cards.description: A fast, bouncing movement used to advance or retreat while staying balanced.
bulletpoints: Keep weight on the balls of your feet for quick movement
Use small, rapid steps rather than large leaps
Maintain constant motion to avoid becoming a static target

cards.title: Angle Step Evasion
cards.description: A sidestepping maneuver used to evade attacks and create new angles of attack.
bulletpoints: Shift laterally instead of retreating backward
Keep hands up while moving to maintain defense
Use foot pivots to quickly change direction
